titles.title: CHIP IN for Veterans Act of 2025
CHIP IN for Veterans Act of 2025
Communities Helping Invest through Property and Improvements Needed for Veterans Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to make permanent the pilot program authorized by the Communities Helping Invest through Property and Improvements Needed for Veterans Act of 2016, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
